text: Kevin Glen Weisman (born December 29, 1970) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Marshall Flinkman on the critically acclaimed, J.J. Abrams' television series, Alias, which aired for five seasons (2001-2006) on ABC. Weisman is Jewish.Jewish Federations of North America: "Film and Television Celebrities Promote Jewish Federations in First-Ever National Television Advertising Campaign - Jewish Stars Promote Federations' Initiatives and Mission" August 2, 2004 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site * *Kevin Weisman at the All Alias Guide Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Jewish American actors
title: Kevin Weisman
